9.Pros: Good first job. Easy to learn. Provides with good first job experience- introducing young people to a work environment. Builds basic skills- customer service skills, money handling, reporting to managers, etc.
9.Cons: There is room for growth initially, but obviously that growth is limited. In this environment, it also tends to be very petty and immature. I.e. you may be passed for promotions because of work drama and personal preferences.
